Package lab.six

Class Buffer

java.lang.Object
lab.six.Buffer
public class Buffer
extends java.lang.Object
Buffer class for taking/outputting Producer/Consumer calls

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) static java.nio.CharBuffer buffer
    The constant buffer.
    (package private) static java.util.concurrent.Semaphore bufferMutex
    bufferMutex secures access to only one thread at a time to interact with the buffer.
    (package private) static java.util.concurrent.Semaphore itemSem
    itemSem acts as a flag for the consumer to awaken when there are items in the buffer.
    (package private) static java.util.concurrent.Semaphore spaceSem
    spaceSem acts as the flag to indicate space exists on the buffer for the producer to know when to cease adding elements until a consumer has performed an output.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Buffer()
    Instantiates a new Buffer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void get()
    get() method is exclusively called by consumer class.
    static void put​(char input)
    put() method is exclusively called by the producer class to add characters to the buffer for consumption.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • buffer

      static java.nio.CharBuffer buffer
      The constant buffer.
      See Also:
      CharBuffer
      buffer acts as a storage for characters stored by Producer and outputted by Consumer's run() calls, respectively.

      Max of ten characters may be stored on a buffer.

    • bufferMutex

      static java.util.concurrent.Semaphore bufferMutex
      bufferMutex secures access to only one thread at a time to interact with the buffer.

    • itemSem

      static java.util.concurrent.Semaphore itemSem
      itemSem acts as a flag for the consumer to awaken when there are items in the buffer.

    • spaceSem

      static java.util.concurrent.Semaphore spaceSem
      spaceSem acts as the flag to indicate space exists on the buffer for the producer to know when to cease adding elements until a consumer has performed an output.

  • Constructor Details

    • Buffer

      public Buffer()
      Instantiates a new Buffer.

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static void get()
      get() method is exclusively called by consumer class. It outputs the contents of the buffer.

    • put

      public static void put​(char input)
      put() method is exclusively called by the producer class to add characters to the buffer for consumption.
      Parameters:
      input - the input
